[[inst_v_lhu]]
==== V.LHU

*Syntax:* v.lhu<.local> [SrcL<.ud>, <lc0<<1>, SrcR.<T><<<shamt>], ->Dst.<W>

*Description:* Vector instruction (VEC engine).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_v_lhu.svg[V.LHU encoding,width=800]
